Property Details: In Anakapalle District, K. Kotapadu, Devarapalli Mandal, Raiwada Gram Panchayat, Raiwada Revenue, residential area Survey No. 75, measuring 96 sq. yds.

1. East: Kurumuji Eswar Rao Gari's terrace house
2. South: Challa Ramulamma Gari's terrace house

4. North: Panchayat C. C. Road

Registered as document no. 39 of 2026 of Book-1 at SRO K.KOTAPADU on 06-JAN-26.

This property is part of Gramakantam. No encumbrances or mortgages exist on this property. Property inherited by Ballanki Ramalakshmi, wife of Ballanki Lakshmana Rao.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 39 of 2026, dated 06-01-2026, executed by Ballanki Ramalaxmi in favour of her Son, Ballanki Dhanaji, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 96 Sq. Yds., comprised in survey number 75 situated in Raiwada Village, Revenue, Grama Panchayathi, Devarapalle Mandal, within the District of Anakapalli registered at sub-registrar office K.kotapadu(304) is bounded as follows: North by: Panchayat C. C. Road South by: RCC House of Challa Ramulamma East by: RCC House of Kurumoji Eswararao West by: Vacant site of Gogada Demudu Note: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Online verification of the Encumbrance Certificate (EC) could not be carried out as the government website https://registration.ec.ap.gov.in/ecSearch was not functional at the time of verification. Accordingly, this report has been prepared based on the EC provided by the F.I. and other documents made available to us. Hence, F.I. is advised to verify the latest updated EC prior to loan disbursement.
